message: This is the first product. I'm offering it to you for $10000. I'm not sure what you think of it, but I'm willing to take the risk of selling it to you at this price. If you're not interested, I'll move on to the next one.
I'll take a chance on the first one. Let's see what it is!

Well, that was a good decision on your part, it was a low-quality product. I'm glad you took a chance and didn't overpay. The next one is also a low-quality product, but I'm willing to let you have it for the same price of $10000. If you're not interested, I'll keep looking for a high-quality one.

Alice, I understand these things happen.  I appreciate your honesty and the special guarantee. I'm willing to give this one a try. Let's see if we can get back on track.

Maybe we can revisit this later when you've had a chance to implement some of those changes.

I completely understand, Bob. I don't blame you for being cautious. I'm starting to think that I've reached a point where I need to take a step back and re-evaluate everything.
